title: GNR-2017-07-20-Harlem-NY-REMIXED
description:
Guns N' Roses
Harlem Shuffle *DEFINITIVE EDITION*
Not In This Lifetime U.S.A. 2017 Tour
July 20, 2017
Apollo Theater
Harlem, New York

Complete capture of the SiriusXM LIVE broadcast of the Guns N' Roses performance on July 20, 2017 in Harlem, New York at the Apollo Theater. 


REMIXED BY CARAM COSTANZO

A sincere THANK YOU to 80309561 for supplying this capture of the remixed Apollo broadcast!

Lineage: SiriusXM Stratus 7 radio (line out capture) -> Audacity (tracking/fades) -> Trader's Little Helper 2.7.0 (FLAC level 8 lossless compression & verification) -> YOU 


- SiriusXM Stratus 7 radio line out capture

- Full show uncut

- No re-encoding to lossy

- BEST Quality

The following improvements were made by rockphantom using Audacity:

- One of second silence added at the beginning

- Two seconds of silence added at the end

- Five second fade in

- Three seconnds of silence before Civil War removed

- Five second fade out

- Promotional spot at the end has been removed to present the recording as a pure live soundboard capture

- Precise tracking

Guns N' Roses 2017:

Lead Vocals: W. Axl Rose
Lead Guitar: Slash
Bass Guitar: Duff McKagan
Keyboards: Dizzy Reed 
Rhythm Guitar: Richard Fortus
Drum: Frank Ferrer
Synthesizers: Melissa Reese

Running Time: 186 minutes

SPECIAL REQUEST: A reputable member of the Guns N' Roses live recording archival community is searching for the video source used for the Saskatoon, Canada March 26, 1993 "Rose In The Wild" 2CD/1DVD set produced by EVSD.
Their objective is to properly transfer the Saskatoon pro-shot video onto 2 DVD's and encode an MKV with high video bitrates and a lossless PCM soundtrack, for the benefit of Guns N' Roses fans worldwide. 
If you are in possession of the Saskatoon '93 video source, please contact rockphantom! Thank you!

Contract 80309561 at mygnrforum.com or on dimeadozen.org if you have the tape

***DO NOT SELL*** 
***DO NOT SHARE WITHOUT THIS INFO***
***SUPPORT YOUR FAVORITE ARTISTS FINANCIALLY***
